work_experience.title: Associate Software Engineer
work_experience.description: As an Associate Software Engineer at Capgemini Technology Services India Limited, I designed and developed more than 20 application features by doing thorough requirements analysis. I effectively fixed over 150 errors that were reported, demonstrating my ability to solve problems and pay close attention to details. I also made thorough mind maps for more than 15 application functionalities in order to speed up the development process. In order to ensure smooth deployment and improved system functionality, I also implemented over 20 automation scripts into the CI/CD pipeline.
